About

About MyStampMaker

MyStampMaker was created with one purpose: to make professional round stamp creation quick, free, and accessible for everyone — especially translators, notaries, freelancers, and small business owners.

As industry professionals ourselves, we recognized how time-consuming and inconsistent stamp creation could be. Certified translators, in particular, need compliant and repeatable results for legal documents. That’s why we built an intuitive, free online stamp generator that anyone can use — securely and without any technical design skills.

Who Uses MyStampMaker?

  • Certified translators and interpreters
  • Freelancers and digital professionals
  • Small business owners and entrepreneurs
  • Legal professionals needing accurate stamp formatting
  • Anyone seeking a personalized round stamp

What Sets Us Apart

  • Ease of Use: No registration, no downloads — just design and go
  • Customization: Adjust fonts, shapes, spacing, borders, and logos in real-time
  • Professional Results: High-resolution downloads ready for print or digital use
  • 100% Free: No watermarks, hidden fees, or subscription traps

Whether you’re preparing official translations, notarizing contracts, or stamping branded documents, MyStampMaker gives you creative freedom with professional accuracy — all in your browser.

Thank you for choosing MyStampMaker — the easiest way to design certified stamps online.
